jobDescription: Build and nurture positive working relationships with teams and clients. Develop solutions using full-stack engineering, low-code/no-code, and platform configuration/customization on leading Marketing & Commerce products. Proactively identify and resolve workstream risks and issues. Improve efficiency and effectiveness of key processes. Build sector knowledge and apply awareness of global trends to address client needs.
requiredSkills: Documentation (requirements, design, use cases, test plans, training manuals)
preferredQualifications: Experience with hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI)
Core Java concepts and experience with Struts, Spring, or MVC frameworks
